headline: Waste companies plan continued fees, tech investments to offset 2025 commodity dips
summary: To mitigate possible commodities-related headwinds in 2025, major waste companies will continue to fine-tune their ongoing automation investments, fee-for-service programs and involvement in EPR contracts.
